verses.verse: O <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> for you have <S%H3782>fallen<s%> by your <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>

<S%H3947>Take<s%> with you <S%H1697>words,<s%> and <S%H7725>turn<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> to him, <S%H5375>Take<s%> away <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> and <S%H3947>receive<s%> us <S%H2896>graciously:<s%> so will we <S%H7999>render<s%> the <S%H6499>calves<s%> of our <S%H8193>lips.<s%>

<S%H804>Asshur<s%> shall not <S%H3467>save<s%> us; we will not <S%H7392>ride<s%> on <S%H5483>horses:<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> will we <S%H559>say<s%> any <S%H5750>more<s%> to the <S%H4639>work<s%> of our <S%H3027>hands,<s%> You are our <S%H430>gods:<s%> for in you the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%> finds <S%H7355>mercy.<s%>
I will <S%H7495>heal<s%> their <S%H4878>backsliding,<s%> I will <S%H157>love<s%> them <S%H5071>freely:<s%> for my <S%H639>anger<s%> is <S%H7725>turned<s%> away from him.
I will be as the <S%H2919>dew<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> he shall <S%H6524>grow<s%> as the <S%H7799>lily,<s%> and <S%H5221>cast<s%> <S%H5221>forth<s%> his <S%H8328>roots<s%> as <S%H3844>Lebanon.<s%>
His <S%H3127>branches<s%> shall <S%H3212>spread,<s%> and his <S%H1935>beauty<s%> shall be as the <S%H2132>olive<s%> tree, and his <S%H7381>smell<s%> as <S%H3844>Lebanon.<s%>

They that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> under his <S%H6738>shadow<s%> shall <S%H7725>return;<s%> they shall <S%H2421>revive<s%> as the <S%H1715>corn,<s%> and <S%H6524>grow<s%> as the <S%H1612>vine:<s%> the <S%H2143>scent<s%> thereof shall be as the <S%H8492>wine<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon.<s%>

<S%H669>Ephraim<s%> shall say, <S%H4100>What<s%> have I to do any <S%H5750>more<s%> with <S%H6091>idols?<s%> I have <S%H6030>heard<s%> him, and <S%H7789>observed<s%> him: I am like a <S%H7488>green<s%> <S%H1265>fir<s%> tree. From me is your <S%H6529>fruit<s%> <S%H4672>found.<s%>

<S%H4310>Who<s%> is <S%H2450>wise,<s%> and he shall <S%H995>understand<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> things? <S%H995>prudent,<s%> and he shall <S%H3045>know<s%> them? for the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> are <S%H3477>right,<s%> and the <S%H6662>just<s%> shall <S%H3212>walk<s%> in them: but the <S%H6586>transgressors<s%> shall <S%H3782>fall<s%> therein.
